**Smart Brush with Real-Time Feedback**: Develop an electric toothbrush that comes equipped with a built-in sensor to track and provide real-time feedback on brushing technique, ensuring users are effectively cleaning their teeth. The sensor would detect pressure, speed, and coverage, offering personalized coaching to improve oral hygiene.

**Toothbrush with Built-In UV Sanitizer**: Design an electric toothbrush with a built-in UV sanitizer that kills bacteria and germs on the brush head and surrounding areas. This feature would provide an additional layer of protection against oral infections and promote a healthier mouth environment.

**Whitening and Desensitizing Brush**: Create an electric toothbrush with interchangeable brush heads that focus on whitening and desensitizing teeth. The whitening brush head would contain mild abrasives and a gentle polishing agent to remove surface stains, while the desensitizing brush head would contain potassium nitrate to reduce sensitivity.

**AI-Powered Oral Health Coach**: Develop an electric toothbrush that integrates with a mobile app to provide users with personalized oral health coaching and recommendations. The app would analyze brushing habits, detect potential issues, and offer tailored advice to improve oral health and prevent problems.

**Glow-in-the-Dark Brush for Kids**: Design an electric toothbrush with a glow-in-the-dark feature that makes brushing teeth a fun and engaging experience for kids. The brush would have a soft, kid-friendly design and come with a variety of colorful, glow-in-the-dark attachments to encourage regular brushing habits and a healthy smile. </s>[INST]
